com.percussion.integration
Interface IPSWsHelper

All Known Implementing Classes:
PSWsHelper
public interface IPSWsHelper

This interface provides the public API to access Rhythmyx web services. Examples of using these methods can be found in the tag library source included with Rhythmyx. See the file taglibsrc.jar

Method Summary

Method Detail

getInbox

PSSearch getInbox(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req,
                  List fieldList,
                  boolean includeActionMenu)
                  throws RemoteException,
                         Exception
Get the Rhythmyx inbox.

Parameters:
req - the original request from the portlet, may not be null
fieldList - a list of strings to identify which fields to be returned with each content item found, may be null or empty in which case a default set of fields will be returned
includeActionMenu - flag indicating whether or not to retrieve the action menu for each item returned, if false do not retrieve the action menu
Returns:
a PSSearch object with the result of content items, this is defined in sys_SearchParameters.xsd schema
Throws:
RemoteException
Exception

getInbox

PSSearch getInbox(String username,
                  String password,
                  List fieldList,
                  boolean includeActionMenu)
                  throws RemoteException,
                         Exception
Get the Rhythmyx inbox.

Parameters:
username - username for authentication header, may not be null or empty
password - password for authentication header, may not be null or empty
fieldList - a list of strings to identify which fields to be returned with each content item found, may be null or empty in which case a default set of fields will be returned
includeActionMenu - flag indicating whether or not to retrieve the action menu for each item returned, if false do not retrieve the action menu
Returns:
a PSSearch object with the result of content items, this is defined in sys_SearchParameters.xsd schema
Throws:
RemoteException
Exception

executeCallDirect

String executeCallDirect(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req,
                         String appLocation,
                         Map paramMap)
                         throws RemoteException,
                                Exception
Call any Rhythmyx application resource and get the resultant data.

Parameters:
req - the original request from the portlet, may not be null
appLocation - the location of the Rhythmyx application resource, assumed not null or empty
paramMap - a map of parameters to be added as HTML paramters to the call, may be null
Returns:
string representing the call to the resource (usually HTML)
Throws:
RemoteException
Exception

executeCallDirect

String executeCallDirect(String username,
                         String password,
                         String appLocation,
                         Map paramMap)
                         throws RemoteException,
                                Exception
Call any Rhythmyx application resource and get the resultant data.

Parameters:
username - username for authentication header, may not be null or empty
password - password for authentication header, may not be null or empty
appLocation - the location of the Rhythmyx application resource, assumed not null or empty
paramMap - a map of parameters to be added as HTML paramters to the call, may be null
Returns:
string representing the call to the resource (usually HTML)
Throws:
RemoteException
Exception

search

PSSearch search(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req,
                PSSearch search,
                IPSSearchFilter filter,
                boolean includeActionMenu)
                throws RemoteException,
                       Exception
Search for content items within the Rhythmyx system.

Parameters:
req - the original request from the portlet, may not be null
search - contains the search information to decide what selection and criteria to build the search, may not be null
filter - the filter interface to apply to the result set, may be null @not implemented yet
includeActionMenu - flag indicating whether or not to retrieve the action menu for each item returned, if false do not retrieve the action menu
Returns:
a PSSearch object that contains the search results
Throws:
RemoteException
Exception

search

PSSearch search(String username,
                String password,
                PSSearch search,
                IPSSearchFilter filter,
                boolean includeActionMenu)
                throws RemoteException,
                       Exception
Search for content items within the Rhythmyx system.

Parameters:
username - username for authentication header, may not be null or empty
password - password for authentication header, may not be null or empty
search - contains the search information to decide what selection and criteria to build the search, may not be null
filter - the filter interface to apply to the result set, may be null @not implemented yet
includeActionMenu - flag indicating whether or not to retrieve the action menu for each item returned, if false do not retrieve the action menu
Returns:
a PSSearch object that contains the search results
Throws:
RemoteException
Exception

setImagePath

void setImagePath(String imagePath)
Sets the image path for use in certain calls such as the action menu call direct. Used to determine the location of the images for showing the action menu triangle.

Parameters:
imagePath - partial path indicating the location of the images, must not be null or empty

formatContentTypeList

Map formatContentTypeList(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                          boolean sort)
                          throws Exception,
                                 RemoteException
Formats the supplied content type list response into a map.

Parameters:
request - that contains information to extract the content list for, may not be null
sort - true to return the content type map sorted in alpha order, false otherwise
Returns:
a map of content types, the map key is the content type name, as String, the value is the ContentTypeAnonType object, never null, may be empty
Throws:
Exception
RemoteException

formatEditorUrl

String formatEditorUrl(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req,
                       Map types,
                       String type)
                       throws MalformedURLException
Returns the fully qualified url for each content editor type specified by the type parameter.

Parameters:
req - the original request from the portlet, may not be null
types - the returned map from formatContentTypeList that contains information about the types, may not be null
type - the name of the content type to get the qualified url for, may not be null
Returns:
the string of the qualified location of the editor
Throws:
MalformedURLException - if the url contained in the types map is bad

getTypeDescription

String getTypeDescription(String type,
                          Map types)
Returns the content type description out of the map created by formatContentTypeList

Parameters:
type - the name of the type of interest, may not be null
types - the returned map from formatContentTypeList that contains information about the types, may not be null
Returns:
the string description for the given type

isFtsEnabled

boolean isFtsEnabled(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
                     throws javax.xml.soap.SOAPException,
                            RemoteException
This method tells the caller if the attached rhythmyx host is using full text search. Note that the results of this are cached on the client.

Parameters:
request - a valid request that must never be null.
Returns:
true if the server is using full text search
Throws:
javax.xml.soap.SOAPException
RemoteException

getProperties

Properties getProperties()
Return the loaded properties map.

Returns:
a map of the properties loaded at init time, never null.

getProtocol

String getProtocol()
Get the protocol used for rhythmyx requests.

Returns:
the protocol, never null or empty. Defaults to http if not specified in the properties file.

getHost

String getHost()
Get the host for rhythmyx requests.

Returns:
the rhythmyx host, never null or empty. Defaults to localhost if not specified in the properties file.

getPort

int getPort()
Get the port used for rhythmyx requests.

Returns:
teh rhythmyx port. Defaults to 7501 if not specified in the properties file.

getRhythmyxRoot

String getRhythmyxRoot()
Gets the rhythmyx root defined in the properties file loaded at startup.

Returns:
the Rhythmyx root, never null or empty. Defaults to Rhythmyx if not specified in the properties file.

getAbsRxRoot

String getAbsRxRoot()
Return the rhythmyx root with an appropriate starting and ending slash for use in resource lookups.

Returns:
The rhythmyx root, never null.

getRhythmyxUrl

String getRhythmyxUrl()
Get the complete rhythmyx url, something like protocol://host:port/RhythmyxRoot.

Returns:
the rhythmyx url, never null or empty. The port is skipped if the default port 80 is specified.

getPortURL

URL getPortURL()
Gets the target enpoint for SOAP requests. This is the location where all SOAP messages will be sent.

Returns:
a url to the target endpoint for the SOAP messages, will not be null

toDOM

Document toDOM(String data)
Helper to convert from a string to a DOM.

Parameters:
data - the string to be converted to a DOM, assumed not null
Returns:
a document based on the data specified

getActionPageLink

String getActionPageLink(int contentid)
Create the appropriate url to bring up the action page for a given contentid.

Parameters:
contentid - The content id to get the action page for, must be valid.
Returns:
The action page javascript for the given content id, never null. The nature of the javascript may depend on the target portal.

getActionPageLink

String getActionPageLink(int contentid,
                         String sessionid)
Create the appropriate javascript to bring up the action page for a given contentid.

Parameters:
contentid - The content id to get the action page for, must be valid.
sessionid - the rhythmyx session id, must never be null or empty
Returns:
The action page javascript for the given content id, never null.

getItemViewer

PSSearch getItemViewer(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req,
                       String itemList,
                       String viewUrl,
                       List fieldList)
                       throws RemoteException,
                              javax.xml.soap.SOAPException
Return an item viewer search

Parameters:
req - http request, must never be null.
itemList - list of items, must never be null.
viewUrl - view url, must never be null.
fieldList - list of fields, must never be null.
Returns:
The search results for an item viewer
Throws:
RemoteException - when an error occurs communicating with the Rhythmyx server.
javax.xml.soap.SOAPException - when an error occurs in the web services
